name: Donutia
description:
A game about donuts. A lot of donuts. Did I say a lot of donuts? I mean a lot of donuts.

Made during GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Easy -> Your only enemy is yourself

Hard -> You've got donuts on your back

Another -> Bored of one-size bites?

Mad -> Donuts be raining on you


Featuring:

- 30 game levels

- 4 difficulty modes

- 8 achievements

- Some cool music

- A whole lot of donuts

Eating a lot of donuts isn't healthy. You've already eaten yesterday. Do not, I repeat, donut eat the donuts.

But you just can't avoid them properly??
